projects.title: Dark Souls-Inspired 2D Game, Made in C#
projects.description:
2D platformer game built entirely from scratch using pure C#!
Inspired by the atmosphere and mechanics of Dark Souls, this game features:
- A sword-and-shield hero with melee and ranged attacks (moonlight sword-inspired blue energy blast)
- AI enemies with patrol and vision-based detection—including orcs and spear-throwing skeletons
- Gameplay elements like keys, coins, chests, elevators, laser traps, and collectible apples for health
- A “YOU DIED” screen with the original Dark Souls sound for an authentic feel
- Background music and smooth scrolling environments to bring the world to life
No game engine used—it was built fully in C#, with assets sourced online and integrated manually.

projects.title: ASCII Simple CPP Game
projects.description:
Simple ASCII game where a wizard in a castle shoots beams, fighting a ghost and a gorilla shooting that attack with bananas, and escaping from bats and laser beams.
 The player wins by reaching the final gate at the end of the arena.
